mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.seller_id AS "user.id", a.member_id AS "member.id", a.name AS "name", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.unit AS "unit", a.price AS "price", a.disaccount AS "disaccount", a.exempt AS "exempt", a.receipt_id AS "receipt.id", a.remark AS "remark", u2.name AS "user.name", m.name AS "member.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.seller_id LEFT JOIN cl_member m ON m.id = a.member_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cl_sale( id, seller_id, member_id, name, quantity, unit, price, disaccount, exempt, receipt_id, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{member.id}, #{name}, #{quantity}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{disaccount}, #{exempt}, #{receipt.id}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cl_sale SET seller_id = #{user.id}, member_id = #{member.id}, name = #{name}, quantity = #{quantity}, unit = #{unit}, price = #{price}, disaccount = #{disaccount}, exempt = #{exempt}, receipt_id = #{receipt.id}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
